Delete [Select Id from Cases Where Case.Account.Name Like 'Customers Test Case Account%'];
Delete [Select Id from Opportunity Where Opportunity.Account.Name Like 'Customers Test Case Account%'];

Delete [SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name Like 'Customers Test Case Account%'];
List<Account> accList = new List<Account>();
Account acc = null;
for(Integer i=0; i<=10; i++) {
    acc = new Account(Name='Customers Test Case Account ' +i);
    accList.add(acc);
}
insert accList;



//To Check Tag Test cases.

Map<String, String> stageStatusMap = new Map<String, String>();
List<String> tempList = new List<String>{'Customer Status','Customer Stage'};
for(JBCXM__Picklist__c pkList : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__SystemName__c FROM
                                 JBCXM__PickList__c Where JBCXM__Category__c IN :tempList ]) {
    stageStatusMap.put(pkList.JBCXM__SystemName__c, pkList.Id);
}
Delete [SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name Like 'Customers Tag Test Case Account%'];
List<Account> accList1 = new List<Account>();
for(Integer i=0; i<=10; i++) {
    Account acc1 = new Account(Name='Customers Tag Test Case Account ' +i);
    accList1.add(acc1);
}
insert accList1;
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custList = new List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
for(Account acc2 : accList1) {
   JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cust = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Account__c = acc2.Id,
                                        JBCXM__Status__c = stageStatusMap.get('ActiveCustomer'),
                                        JBCXM__Stage__c = stageStatusMap.get('stage1'));
    custList.add(cust);
}
insert custList;
